actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: A bill to amend section 1905 of title 44 of the United States Code relating to depository libraries.

summary.text: Increases the number of depository libraries which Senators, Representatives, the Resident Commissioner from Puerto Rico, the Commissioner of the District of Columbia, and the Governors of Guam, American Samoa, and the Virgin Islands, may designate to receive Government publications from two within such area to three within each area. (Amends 44 U.S.C. 1905)

titles.title: A bill to amend section 1905 of title 44 of the United States Code relating to depository libraries.
